getStarted.question: How do I get started?
getStarted.answer: Contact us to set up your organization's account and begin your research journey.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we implement enterprise-grade security measures to protect your research data.

cities.question: Can we operate in multiple cities?
cities.answer: Yes, ConnectGate allows you to manage separate operations in different cities while keeping each location's data completely separate and secure.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This Privacy Policy outlines the policies and practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of user information when utilizing the ConnectGate service. It also informs users about their privacy rights and the legal protections in place.

interpretation.title: Interpretation and Definitions
interpretation.content:
Terms beginning with an initial capital letter have meanings defined under the following conditions. The definitions provided apply whether the terms appear in singular or plural.

• Account: A unique account created to access our Service
• Affiliate: An entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with ConnectGate
• Application: Refers to ConnectGate, the software program provided by the Company
• Company: Referred to as "the Company," "We," "Us," or "Our" in this Agreement
• Country: Iraq
• Device: Any smartphone capable of accessing the Service (e.g., iPhone, Android)
• Personal Data: Information related to an identified or identifiable individual
• Service: Refers to the ConnectGate Application
• Service Provider: Natural or legal person processing data on behalf of the Company

personalData.title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
personalData.content:
Types of Data Collected:

Personal Data:
While using our Service, we may collect personally identifiable information, including but not limited to:
• First name and last name
• Phone number
• Email address

Usage Data:
Automatically collected data during Service use may include:
• Internet Protocol address
• Browser type and version
• Pages visited
• Date and time of visit
• Time spent on pages
• Unique device identifiers

Location Information:
With your prior permission and while using the Application, we may collect and process information about your location to provide location-based services.

dataUse.title: Use of Your Personal Data
dataUse.content:
We may use Personal Data for various purposes:

• Providing and maintaining our Service
• Managing your Account
• Contacting you for updates or informative communications
• Providing news, special offers, and general information
• Managing user requests
• Evaluating and improving our Service

We will not use your Personal Data for purposes other than those specified in this Privacy Policy without your consent.

dataSharing.title: Sharing Your Personal Information
dataSharing.content:
We may share your personal information in these situations:

• With Service Providers for Service monitoring and analysis
• During business transfers, mergers, or acquisitions
• With Affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy
• With business partners to offer products, services, or promotions
• With other users when you share personal information
• With your consent for other purposes

We take all necessary steps to ensure that companies receiving your data are bound by the same level of data protection.

dataRetention.title: Retention and Transfer of Personal Data
dataRetention.content:
Data Retention:
• We retain Personal Data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy
• Usage Data may be retained for internal analysis, security, or functionality improvement

Data Transfer:
• Your information may be processed and maintained outside your jurisdiction
• We take necessary steps to ensure secure data treatment in accordance with this Privacy Policy
• You consent to this transfer by using our Service

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.content:
The security of your Personal Data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, including:
• Encrypted data transmission
• Regular security assessments
• Access controls and authentication
• Regular security updates

While we implement these security measures, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: By accessing or using the ConnectGate application, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our Service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the ConnectGate application ("ConnectGate"), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not use our Service.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content:
To use certain features of the App, your organization's admin will create your account. As the app does not require registration by individual users, all access and activities are managed by the admin.

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information provided by the admin, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

appropriateUse.title: Appropriate Use
appropriateUse.content:
You agree to use the App for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe upon the rights of others.

Any use of the App for malicious or unlawful purposes is strictly prohibited.

dataManagement.title: Data and Content Management
dataManagement.content:
• Admins can create questions, manage groups, and download reports
• Users can answer questions and participate in groups as assigned by the admin
• The information managed and shared within the app is to be used solely for the intended research purposes
• No personal data is collected from users by the app

noDataCollection.title: No Data Collection
noDataCollection.content:
ConnectGate does not collect any personal data from users.

The app does not require any permissions, and no user data is transmitted or stored by the Company.

changes.title: Changes to Terms and Conditions
changes.content:
We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time.

You will be notified of any changes, and your continued use of the App after the changes signify your acceptance of the updated Terms and Conditions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.content: We employ industry-standard encryption protocols to protect your data both in transit and at rest. All communications between your device and our servers are encrypted using TLS 1.3.

authentication.title: Authentication & Access Control
authentication.content: We implement robust authentication mechanisms including multi-factor authentication and secure password policies. Access to data is strictly controlled and monitored.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection Measures
dataProtection.content: Your research data is protected using multiple layers of security. We regularly backup data and implement strict access controls to prevent unauthorized access.

monitoring.title: Security Monitoring
monitoring.content: Our systems are continuously monitored for potential security threats. We employ advanced threat detection systems and regular security audits.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.content: We adhere to international security standards and maintain compliance with relevant data protection regulations to ensure the highest level of security.

incident.title: Incident Response
incident.content: We have a comprehensive incident response plan in place. In the event of a security incident, we will promptly notify affected users and take necessary remedial actions.

updates.title: Security Updates
updates.content: We regularly update our security measures to address new threats and vulnerabilities. Our systems are continuously patched and maintained.

contact.title: Security Contact
contact.content: For any security concerns or to report potential vulnerabilities, please contact our security team immediately.
